main_detector module

Auxiliary script with command-line user interface for training and testing object detectors based on FastRealBoostBins classifier from frbb module.

For help on the script arguments execute:

python main_detector.py -h

For usage examples, see the README.md file in project’s repository (https://github.com/pklesk/fast_rboost_bins).

Dependencies

  • frbb: required to import the class FastRealBoostBins.

  • numpy, math: required for mathematical computations.

  • numba: required for just-in-time compilation of crucial computational functions and CUDA kernels (decorated by @jit and @cuda.jit imported from numba).

  • sklearn: required for inheritence and other sklearn API purposes,

  • colorama: required for CLI purposes,

  • cv2: required for video capturing,

  • joblib: required for comparisons: CPU with parallelization vs GPU.

Link to project repository

https://github.com/pklesk/fast_rboost_bins

main_detector.measure_accs_of_model(clf, X_train, y_train, X_test, y_test)[source]

Measures and prints accuracies of a model (classifier) for given train and test data.

main_detector.best_decision_threshold_via_precision(roc, y_test, heuristic_coeff)[source]

Returns the best decision threshold that maximizes (approximately) the precision measure for test data (by analyzing its ROC curve).

main_detector.adjust_decision_threshold_via_precision(clf, X_test, y_test, heuristic_coeff=0.25)[source]

Replaces the clf.decision_threshold_ value in a classifier by determining the threshold that maximizes (approximately) the precision measure for test data (by analyzing its ROC curve).

main_detector.draw_feature_at(i, j0, k0, shcoords_one_feature)[source]

Draws a Haar-like feature on top of an image (with transparency) at a given position.

main_detector.demo_haar_features(hinds, hcoords, n, selected_indexes=None)[source]

Performs a demonstration of Haar-like features (all or selected by specified indexes) by sequentially drawing them on top of a prepared image (with a face or hand gesture).

main_detector.prepare_detection_windows_and_scaled_haar_coords(image_height, image_width, hcoords, features_indexes)[source]

Prepares and returns coordinates of all windows (two-dimensional array) to be checked during a detection procedure together with relative and scaled pixel coordinates of Haar-like features (four-dimensional array).

main_detector.prepare_detection_windows(image_height, image_width)[source]

Prepares and returns coordinates of all windows (two-dimensional array) to be checked during a detection procedure.

main_detector.prepare_scaled_haar_coords(hcoords, features_indexes)[source]

Prepares and returns relative and scaled pixel coordinates of Haar-like features (four-dimensional array) suitable for a detection procedure.

main_detector.detect_cpu_simple(i, clf, hcoords, n, features_indexes, decision_threshold=None, windows=None, shcoords_multiple_scales=None, verbose=False)[source]

Performs detection on an image frame in the cpu_simple mode (i.e. with no CPU parallelization, nor GPU usage). Called for each frame from within the demo_detect_in_video function.

main_detector.detect_cpu_parallel(i, clf, hcoords, n, features_indexes, decision_threshold=None, windows=None, shcoords_multiple_scales=None, n_jobs=8, verbose=False)[source]

Performs detection on an image frame in the cpu_parallel mode (i.e. with CPU parallelization via joblib.Parallel object, but with no GPU usage). Called for each frame from within the demo_detect_in_video function.

main_detector.detect_gpu_cuda(i, clf, hcoords, features_indexes, decision_threshold=None, windows=None, shcoords_multiple_scales=None, dev_windows=None, dev_shcoords_multiple_scales=None, dev_X_selected=None, dev_mins_selected=None, dev_maxes_selected=None, dev_logits=None, dev_responses=None, verbose=False)[source]

Performs detection on an image frame in the gpu_cude mode (i.e. using GPU CUDA-based computations for both feature extraction and classifier responses). Called for each frame from within the demo_detect_in_video function.

main_detector.detect_gpu_cuda_within_multiple_clfs(ii, clf, decision_threshold, windows, dev_windows=None, dev_shcoords_multiple_scales=None, dev_X_selected=None, dev_mins_selected=None, dev_maxes_selected=None, dev_logits=None, dev_responses=None, verbose=False)[source]

Function called from a detection procedure meant for multiple classifiers - performs detection on an image frame (given its integral image computed earlier) in the gpu_cude mode (i.e. using GPU CUDA-based computations for both feature extraction and classifier responses). Called for each frame from within the demo_detect_in_video_multiple_clfs function.

main_detector.postprocess_nms(detections, responses, iou_threshold=0.25)[source]

Postprocesses the list of detections (bounding boxes) according to the non-max suppression approach.

main_detector.postprocess_avg(detections, responses, iou_threshold=0.25)[source]

Postprocesses the list of detections (bounding boxes) according to the averaging approach.

main_detector.short_cpu_name(cpu_name)[source]

Returns a short version of a full CPU name (for the purpose of displaying it on video frames).

main_detector.color_by_detector_title(colors_detect, detector_title)[source]

Returns a color (meant to draw a detected bounding box) based on a detector title.

main_detector.demo_detect_in_video(clf, hcoords, decision_threshold, computations='gpu_cuda', postprocess='avg', n_jobs=8, detector_title=None, verbose_loop=True, verbose_detect=False)[source]

Performs a demonstration of detection procedure (using a single binary classifier - an instance of FastRealBoostBins) in a video sequence captured from camera. Depending on the mode of computations (argument computations being one of: "cpu_simple", "cpu_parallel", "gpu_cuda"), makes calls for each frame to, respectively, one of the following functions: detect_cpu_simple, detect_cpu_parallel, detect_gpu_cuda.

main_detector.demo_detect_in_video_multiple_clfs(clfs, hcoords, decision_thresholds, postprocess='avg', detector_title=None, verbose_loop=True, verbose_detect=False)[source]

Performs a demonstration of detection procedure (using multiple binary classifiers - instances of FastRealBoostBins) in a video sequence captured from camera. For each frame makes of call to detect_gpu_cuda_within_multiple_clfs function.

main_detector.str_to_float_or_none(s)[source]

Utility function for argparse.ArgumentParser (see parse_args function) meant to return a floating-point number from its string representation or a None value.

main_detector.str_to_int_or_none(s)[source]

Utility function for argparse.ArgumentParser (see parse_args function) meant to return an integer from its string representation or a None value.

main_detector.parse_args()[source]

Returns a dictionary of arguments specified by user from CLI.
